001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Matrix;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Notations;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedVector;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.FeatureMatrices;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
012
013public class ClosedSolutionOptimizer<N extends Number> implements LinearModelOptimizer<N> {
014
015    private boolean debugOutput;
016
017    private final JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport;
018
019    public ClosedSolutionOptimizer(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
020        this.typeSupport = typeSupport;
021    }
022
023    @Override
024    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getNumberTypeSupport() {
025        return typeSupport;
026    }
027
028    public boolean isDebugOutput() {
029        return debugOutput;
030    }
031
032    public void setDebugOutput(boolean debugOutput) {
033        this.debugOutput = debugOutput;
034    }
035
036    @Override
037    public void setOptimalWeights(LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> regression, DataSet<N> trainSet) {
038        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = regression.getNumberTypeSupport();
039        if (debugOutput) {
040            System.out.println("Number type = " + typeSupport.name());
041        }
042
043        Array<N> values = typeSupport.createArray(trainSet.size());
044        for (int i = 0; i < values.length(); i++) {
045            values.set(i, trainSet.samples().get(i).targetOutputs().get(0));
046        }
047        TypedVector<N> y = new TypedVector<>(values, true, typeSupport);
048        if (debugOutput) {
049            y.print("y");
050        }
051        Matrix<N> designMatrix = FeatureMatrices.create(regression.getFeatureExtractor(), trainSet);
052        if (debugOutput) {
053            designMatrix.print("Φ");
054        }
055
056        Matrix<N> invertedDesignMatrix = designMatrix.pseudoInvert();
057        if (debugOutput) {
058            invertedDesignMatrix.multiply(designMatrix).print("Φ" + Notations.PSEUDO_INVERSE + "Φ = I");
059        }
060
061        Vector<N> weights = invertedDesignMatrix.multiply(y);
062        if (debugOutput) {
063            weights.print("w");
064        }
065
066        for (int i = 0; i < weights.getDimensions(); i++) {
067            regression.setParameter(i, weights.get(i + 1));
068        }
069    }
070
071}
